metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7337 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The editor in IPython Notebook before 3.2.2 and Jupyter Notebook 4.0.x before 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript code via a crafted file, which triggers a redirect to files/, related to MIME types.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7337` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython - 5.5.0-1
ipython3 - 5.5.0-1
python-ipython - 5.5.0-1
python3-ipython - 5.5.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ipython package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0-1').
